title: Thursday Post Show (07-01-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (07-01-21)
description:
Bobby reads a viral list of overrated jobs. Bobby talks to Lunchbox why he hasn’t had success as a voice actor yet. Now he’s thinking about getting an agent. Eddie thinks he heard gang activity while playing video games online. Bobby also talks about when he has kids…would he rather them want to be a pro athlete or a pro gamer?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
